Title: Aperitivo
Writer: Bryan Fuller (developed for television by), Thomas Harris (characters from the book "Red Dragon"), Nick Antosca, Bryan Fuller, Steve Lightfoot
Actors: Mads Mikkelsen, Hugh Dancy, Caroline Dhavernas, Gillian Anderson
Plot: Dr. Fredrick Chilton is alive and well, if not somewhat reconstructed, urging those wronged by Hannibal Lecter to use Will Graham as bait to flush him out.
